reviews.review: Замечательная игра, играю уже в неё на протяжение 8-10 лет, не наскучила до сих пор, графика доставляет удовольствие, также как и игра в неё, для своих лет она была достаточно хорошо сделана, играйте , не пожалеете !!! :))

A must have for any Source fan. Fairly fun once you get the gist of things, especially when you master b-hopping, making the game even more fast paced. If you want quick, fast, and fun action, this is the game for you. Although aiming can be a problem for new users, you can easily get used to it.
Heck ya this game is awesome! Its got great graphics AND unlocks so much more to garrys mod! Get it now!
YES YES FOR GMOD AND AWESOMENESS
The old classic CS nwo in a new graphic engine!!! Multiplayer only for those old-timers out there!! Enjoy!

This game is hands down amazing. Many of the people that play CSS are veterans and have a lot of skill and experience with the  game. There are no overpowered guns, however some guns are better than others on certain maps. Since the people that play CSS are veterans, they are usually good and provide a challenge for new players such as me. The game seems to run best on teamwork because it is almost impossible to win if your team is not helping each other out. If you are not one of those people who play with teams well, then you better start practicing because this game forces you to do it, no matter how hard you try, you are eventually going to help your team out in one way or another. CSS also has a variety of gamemodes that can range from saving hostages and prison breaks, to defusing or planting bombs and surfing around. There are also certain servers that are more like obstacle courses than combat but nonetheless its still fun. In my opinion I find this game amazing and there is nothing bad about it that would make most people not want to play it. I have one recommendation however, add some servers that are meant for new players.

This game probably doesn't need a review but still: the best online shooter game ever! Have been playing it for years. I actually like it more than Global Offensive cuz in GO all those numerous scenery objects of the environment distract too much and make it too difficult to spot the models of the enemy/friendly players. Source is also better than 1.6 due to numerous fixes and balancing.
